context_snippets: Incoming Matcha Lovers DO NOT BUY MATCHA AT UCLA CAFES 😭  This is a matcha I bought last year and it was like not mixed at all and tasted horrible
some thoughts on matchas ive tried recently! im a casual matcha latte drinker, i drink it for a majority of the week
i have yet to find my perfect matcha but well get there eventually
its pretty astringent, not much umami but you still have a slight grassy taste
definitely would not consider it bold

Like I’m being reduced to a flavor instead of seen as a whole person
Ghirardelli Dark Chocolate w/ coffee and Ghirardelli Semi-Sweet chocolate sans coffee Inspired by u/ashbakesstuff, I decided to make two chocolate sourdough loaves
One with dark chocolate chunks and a double-shot of espresso and another without coffee and semi-sweet chocolate chunks
Additionally, I avoided a cold ferment with this batch as I wanted to avoid too much sour flavor and let the chocolate shine through a little more

context_snippets: Most days I love having a nice replica of pour-over coffee with complex flavors and artisan beans
But there are days when I have to get up at 5am and I just want a strong basic cup of cheap coffee
With cheap beans you don't really want a separation of flavors
There is no "complexity" you want to bring out in the cup

Perfect for fall! 

Again this is inspired by arisfitjournal on tiktok but I adjusted the recipe to be lower calorie

context_snippets: Most days I love having a nice replica of pour-over coffee with complex flavors and artisan beans
But there are days when I have to get up at 5am and I just want a strong basic cup of cheap coffee
With cheap beans you don't really want a separation of flavors
There is no "complexity" you want to bring out in the cup
Think rich amber, smoky woods, vanilla, leather, perfumes that make you feel cozy but still confident stepping out into frosty streets
